pre_caption: This is a scenic video. The shot is a wide-angle view from the bow of a massive container ship at sea. Colorful shipping containers are stacked high on the deck, leading the eye toward the horizon under a vast, cloud-streaked sky, with a few other distant vessels visible on the calm water.
